column5:
カード説明テキスト
デッキ構築画面でカードを選択すると出る説明文
column6:
出現ステージ
数字のステージ以降から出現する
0は初期所持
1〜6　EASY
11〜16　NORMAL
21〜26　HARD
31〜36　LUNA
column7:
レアリティ
0　コモン
1　アンコモン
2　レア
取得抽選で
コモン60％
アンコ30％
レア10％

column5: Uses her vampiric physical to make a quick leap forward. She is free to move during it\, so it's a flexible move.
Uses magic circles to fire multiple beams. It's a standard powerful magic attack.
Spins forward while attacking with her weapon. It's an attack with high destructive power.
Uses her weapon to do a fiery slash attack. It can be executed twice by pressing the button again.
Transforms into bats and charges in. It's basically impossible to hit her in this state.
Shoots chains that will latch on to the floor or wall. When it does\, she can pull herself into it. It's a quick tool for mobility.
Covers self in a red aura that forms like a cross. She can't make it as good as her sister\, so this is not a spell card.
Dives down into the floor\, creating shockwaves.
Makes a full rotation slash while sliding at high speed. It's a move that can be used for dancing as well\, but being too close is not recommended.
Calls upon a pack of bats to bite from the opponent's back. Charging the attack will increase the number of bats summoned.

Grabs the opponent and sucks their   blood. Because she has to approach  from the front\, there's quite a gap.The move can not be blocked and     recovers life\, so this move can     definitely exert pressure.
Gathers magic and forms a cross\,    then throws it at the enemy in a    jumping attack. The projectile is big and stays for some time.
Fires bullets forming a rainbow. It's a weaker\, less violent version of Starbow Break. It looks beautiful but don't touch it.
She stares down and tries to destroy her opponent from a distance. This move is not avoidable if the opponent is in a bad spot.
Directly attack by activating       vampiric energies. She's not        invincible\, but she can move in the air afterwards\, so it's a card with great latitudes of freedom.
Fires bullets forming a starbow. Luck is said to be found at the end of the rainbow.
A more powerful version of Death Stare. She is using her ability to destroy things\, but she's still trying to not make it too overpowered.
Erupts a massive magical sword which are then swung across the area. It's a very large scale attack. Caution is required.
A spinning attack done on the air. If you swing it hard enough\, a weapon can have way bigger effect area than it physically looks.
Spawns four clones of herself to chase down the opponent. They are good at chasing\, so it's very hard to evade.
Creates a magical aura that drains  life from the opponent on hit. It's very strong\, but while its active\,  her defense is lowered\, so it's a   double-edged sword.
Executes a powerful rotating slash after a short charge time. It's a little slow\, but it's an extremely lethal move.
